data.name: Rhiannon: Curse of the Four Branches
data.detailed_description:
Digital Deluxe Edition

Premium version of Rhiannon: Curse of the Four Branches includes these added features:

  • In-game tutorial
  • Interactive Map
  • In-game hint system
  • Improved navigation


About the Game

A First-Person Mythological Adventure

Rhiannon: Curse of the Four Branches is a first-person point-and-click adventure rooted in Welsh mythology. Set in a quiet modern village overshadowed by ancient legends, the game blends folklore, investigation, and psychological tension into a slow-burning mystery.

Players explore detailed environments, uncover hidden clues, and piece together a story that bridges the present with mythic pasts.

Investigation, Puzzles, and Exploration

Gameplay centers on exploration and puzzle-solving rather than action. Players interact with objects, examine environments, and solve logic-based challenges to advance the story.

Progress comes from careful observation and thoughtful investigation, making the experience ideal for fans of classic narrative adventure games.

A Dark and Atmospheric Mystery

Rhiannon builds tension through mood and storytelling rather than violence. Its atmosphere is eerie and unsettling, drawing heavily from folklore themes of curses, fate, and ancient powers.

This is a single-player, story-driven experience designed for players who enjoy slow-paced mysteries and mythological storytelling.

Key Features

  • First-person point-and-click adventure gameplay

  • Story inspired by Welsh mythology and folklore

  • Puzzle-solving and investigation-driven progression

  • Dark, atmospheric tone focused on mystery

  • Exploration of detailed, realistic environments

  • Single-player narrative experience
